CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Require manual reset of alarms to reset them to silence them.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Latch Alarm Timer Duration (sec)
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Duration in seconds that alarms will initiate for before being silenced automatically.

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Issue an audible alarm if the seizure detector enters an alarm condition.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Audible Alarm

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Issue an audible alarm if the seizure detector enters a warning (pre-alarm) condition.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Audible Warnings

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Issue an audible alarm if the system detects a fault (e.g. can not talk to Pebble).
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Audible System FaultWarnings

EditTextPreference.android:title: Fault Timer Duration (sec)
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Duration that fault alarms are muted before initiating.

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Play an MP3 file to create the alarm beeps rather than using the default tone generator.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use MP3 Alarm Sound

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Issue a SMS (Text Message) alarm if the seizure detector enters an alarm condition. NOTE: THE MESSAGE WILL INCLUDE THE USER's LOCATION. Disable this option if sharing your location is a concern.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable SMS Alarm

EditTextPreference.android:summary: Telephone number(s) to notify by SMS of Alarm (comma separated).
EditTextPreference.android:title: SMS Alarm numbers

EditTextPreference.android:summary: Message to be Sent by SMS when a Seizure is Detected.
EditTextPreference.android:title: SMS Message

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Dial the Carer(s) phone number(s) as well as sending SMS alerts. It requests an external application (OpenSeizureDetector Dialler) to make the phone calls to the same numbers as are set for SMS alerts above
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Phone Call Alarm

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Log Alarm events to SD Card
